Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Jackson. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Jackson.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Sacramento
ShortDescription: WB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Sacramento.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Marine Dr.
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, 78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, #78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

 

Please allow extra travel time
